price: 71. quand, le carcan autour du cou et traînés dans leurs chaînes,
arabic: إِذِ ٱلۡأَغۡلَٰلُ فِيٓ أَعۡنَٰقِهِمۡ وَٱلسَّلَٰسِلُ يُسۡحَبُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: idhi al-aghlālu fī aʿnāqihim wal-salāsilu yus'ḥabūna
